gurmukhi: qb AaurMg jIA mwNJ irswey ] eyk AhdIAw eIhwN pTwey ]
transliteration: Tab Auran Jooa Maanjh Risaae|| Ek Ahdooaa Oohaan Pathaae||
translation: The son of Aurangzeb grew very angry and sent a subordinate in this direction.

gurmukhi: hm qy Bwij ibmuK jy gey ] iqn ky Dwm igrwvq Bey ]4]
transliteration: Ham Te Bhaaj(i) Bimoukh Je Gad|| Tin Ke Dhaam Giraavat Bhae||4||
translation: Those who had left me in distrust, their homes were demolished by him.4.

gurmukhi: jy Apny gur qy muK iPrhYN ] eIhwN aUhwN iqn ky giH igirhYN ]
transliteration: Je Apne Gur Te Mouch Phir-hain|| Eehaan Oohaan Tin Ke Grih Gir(i)-hain||
translation: Those who turn away their faces from the Guru, their houses are demolished in this and the next world.

gurmukhi: iehwN auprws n sur pur bwsw ] sB bwqn qy rhY inrwsw ]5]
transliteration: Ihaan Oup-haas Na Sur Pur Baasaa|| Sabh Baatan Te Rahai Niraasaa||5||
translation: They are ridiculed here and also do not get and abode in heaven. They also remain disappointed in all things.5.

gurmukhi: dUK BUK iqn ko rhY lwgI ] sMq syv qy jo hY iqAwgI ]
transliteration: Dookh Bhookh Tin Ko Rahai Laagoo|| Sant Sev Te Jo Hai Tiaagoo||
translation: They are always inflicted by hunger and sorrow, those, who have forsaken the service of the saints.

gurmukhi: jgq ibKY koeI kwm n srhIN ] AMqih kuMf nrk kI prhIN ]6]
transliteration: Jagad Bikhai Ko( i)  Kaam Na Sar-hoon|| Antah(i) Kound Narak Koo Par-hoon||6||
translation: None of their wish is fulfilled in the world and in the end, they abide in the fire of the abyss of hell.6.

gurmukhi: iqn ko sdw jgq auphwsw ] AMqih kuMf nrk kI bwsw ]
transliteration: Tin Ko Sadaa Jagad Oup-haasaa|| Antah(i) Kound Narak Koo Baasaa||
translation: They are always ridiculed in the world and in the end, they abide in the fire of the abyss of hell.

gurmukhi: gur pg qy jy bymuK isDwry ] eIhwN aUhw iqn ky muK kwry ]7]
transliteration: Gurpag Te Je Bemoukh Sidhdare|| Eehaan Oohaa Tin Ke Mouch Kdare||7||
translation: Those, who turn away their face from the feet of the Guru, their faces are blackened in this and the next world.7.

gurmukhi: puqR pauqR iqn ky nhIN PrYN ] duK dY mwq ipqw ko mrYN ]
transliteration: Poutra Paoutra Tin Ke Nahoon Pdarain|| Doukh Dai Maat Pitaa Ko Darain||
translation: Their sons and grandsons do not prosper and they die, creating great agony for their parents.

gurmukhi: gur doKI sg kI miRq pwvY ] nrk kuMf fwry pCuqwvY ]8]
transliteration: Gur Dokhoo Sag Koo Mrit Paavai|| Narak Kound Ddare Pachhoutaavai||8||
translation: The one, who hath malice of the Guru in his heart, dies the death of ad dog. He repents, when he is thrown in the abyss of hell.8.

gurmukhi: bwby ky bwbr ky doaU ] Awp kry prmysr soaU ]
transliteration: Baahe Ke Baabar Ke Dooo|| Aap Dare Parmesar Sooo||
translation: The successors of both, Baba (Nanak) and Badur were created by God Himself.

gurmukhi: dIn swh ien ko pihcwno ] dunI p`iq aun kO Anumwno ]9]
transliteration: Doon Saah In Ko Pahichaano|| Dounoo Patt(i) Oun Kau Anoumaano||9||
translation: Recognise the former as the spiritual king and the later as temporal king.9.

gurmukhi: jo bwby ky dwm n dYhYN ] iqn qy gih bwbr ky lYhYN ]
transliteration: Jo Baabe Ke Daam Na Daihain|| Tin Te Gad(i) Baabar Ke Laihain||
translation: Those who do not deliver the Guruâ€™s money, the successors of Babur shall seize and take away forcibly from them.

gurmukhi: dY dY iqn kO bfI sjwie ] puin lYhYN giH lUt bnwie ]10]
transliteration: Dai Dai Tin Kau Badoo Sajaae|| Poun(i) Laihain Grih Loot Banaae||10||
translation: They will be greatly punished (and their houses will he plundered.10.
